name: Orangehead
description:
Orangehead is an arcade-inspired, top-down, run-for-your-life game. Run from countless "Juicys" as they chase you and try to make you one of them. throw seeds at them to make them flinch and to eliminate them. 

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move;

Left click to spit seeds;

The seeds move in the general direction of the mouse cursor;

Esc to pause/unpause the game.

This is my first game, thanks for checking it out!
